metadata.title: CVE-2023-5543 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: When duplicating a BigBlueButton activity, the original meeting ID was alsoduplicated instead of using a new ID for the new activity. This couldprovide unintended access to the original meeting.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
